data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
In the minute 2, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Tottenham drives forward and Giovani Lo Celso gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tottenham's Harry Kane gets in a shot on goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Newcastle.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tottenham close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 7, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Tottenham push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Harry Kane gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Newcastle defence.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Newcastle.
Free kick Newcastle.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 23, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Moura is on target to give Tottenham a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Harry Kane.
In the minute 27, Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Harry Kane gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tottenham.
In the minute 29, Newcastle drive forward but Callum Wilson is judged offside.
Heung Min Son (Tottenham) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Tottenham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In London, Eric Dier (Tottenham) misses the target with a header.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Tottenham are coming forward and Giovani Lo Celso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a Newcastle throw-in in Tottenham's half.
In the minute 36, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In London, Miguel Almiron of Newcastle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tottenham's Harry Kane gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, Peter Bankes awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 42, Tottenham apply pressure at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Heung Min Son but the strike hits the bar!
Ben Davies for Tottenham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Newcastle at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
In the minute 43, Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tottenham's half?
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Tottenham.
Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Jamaal Lascelles returns to the field for Newcastle after picking up a slight injury.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In London Newcastle attack through Jonjo Shelvey. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Tottenham have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Jamaal Lascelles is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Peter Bankes has blown to start the second-half.
Tottenham's Harry Kane misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Heung Min Son with Steven Bergwijn. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Mourinho.
In the minute 47, Free kick Newcastle.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 50, Tottenham's Lucas Moura goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Tottenham push forward at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium and Pierre Hojbjerg gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
In London Tottenham drive forward through Giovani Lo Celso. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 51, Matt Ritchie (Newcastle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in London.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle's Joelinton has been booked in London.
Tottenham needs to be cautious. Newcastle have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 56, Joelinton of Newcastle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Peter Bankes awards Tottenham a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Newcastle at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Peter Bankes awards the away team a throw-in.
Harry Kane of Tottenham smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 61, Newcastle's Jeff Hendrick breaks free at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Tottenham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
Tottenham pushes forward through Giovani Lo Celso, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 62, Peter Bankes signals a Tottenham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Throw-in Tottenham.
Can Tottenham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
In the minute 66, Matt Ritchie is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
It seems as if Matt Ritchie is unable to continue. Jamal Lewis replaces him for the away team.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
In the minute 71, Tottenham's Steven Bergwijn is on target but unsuccessful.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Tottenham in their own half.
The away team replace Jeff Hendrick with Jacob Murphy.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Corner awarded to Tottenham.
In the minute 76, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Tottenham make their second substitution with Tanguy Ndombele replacing Giovani Lo Celso.
Steve Bruce (Newcastle) is making a third substitution, with Andy Carroll replacing Miguel Almiron.
In the minute 79, Tottenham's Lucas Moura gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erik Lamela is replacing Lucas Moura for the home team.
In the minute 80, Tottenham to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tottenham are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 82, Jamal Lewis (Newcastle) has received a yellow card from Peter Bankes.
Erik Lamela for Tottenham drives towards goal at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Tottenham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 84, Newcastle to take a throw-in in Tottenham territory.
Free kick for Tottenham in their own half.
Peter Bankes signals a Tottenham throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Tottenham in the half of Newcastle.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Tottenham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Tottenham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Tottenham drives forward and Harry Kane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Important block from the Tottenham defence as Andy Carroll fires in a strike for Newcastle.
Free kick for Tottenham in the half of Newcastle.
Peter Bankes will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
An attacking Newcastle player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Isaac Hayden for Newcastle has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Callum Wilson makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
At Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, Harry Winks has been yellow-carded for the home team.
